scripts.test-asm: cd test && tsc && emcc -std=c++11 -stdlib=libc++ -I../include -g -o foo.js ../src/em/Binding.cc PrimitiveMethods.cc GetterSetter.cc Callback.cc --js-library nbind.js -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_nbind_init']" -s ASSERTIONS=2 && tap --gc test-asm.js
scripts.test: cd test && autogypi && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && tap --gc test.js
